verses.name: John 19:6
verses.text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him, they cried out, saying, Crucify him, crucify him. Pilate saith unto them, Take ye him, and crucify him: for I find no fault in him.

verses.name: John 19:7
verses.text: The Jews answered him, We have a law, and by our law he ought to die, because he made himself the Son of God.

verses.name: John 19:8
verses.text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he was the more afraid;

verses.name: John 19:9
verses.text: And went again into the judgment hall, and saith unto Jesus, Whence art thou? But Jesus gave him no answer.
